publications.title: Identification of hate material in code-mixed social media data using demographic and contextual information
publications.shortDescription: Advanced NLP research on detecting hate speech in code-mixed Hindi-English social media content using demographic and contextual analysis.
description: This research project examines innovative methods to detect targeted audience and severity of code-mixed/Hinglish (Hindi+English) hate speech in social media platforms.
The project focuses on distinguishing hate speech from general profanity by incorporating demographic and contextual information, which is crucial for accurate detection in multilingual environments.
We established lexical baselines for this challenging task by applying advanced NLP algorithms using custom datasets and specialized embeddings designed for code-mixed content.
features: Custom dataset creation for Hindi-English code-mixed content
Advanced NLP algorithms for hate speech detection
Lexical baseline establishment for code-mixed languages
Severity classification of hate speech content
publications.impact: Contributed to safer social media environments through improved hate speech detection

publications.title: IndiaStack API for educational institutions
publications.shortDescription: Comprehensive digital solution leveraging IndiaStack APIs to streamline educational institution admission processes.
description: This project harnesses the power of IndiaStack APIs, notably the Digilocker API, to create a seamless digital infrastructure for educational institutions.
The solution aims to simplify and digitize the admission process by integrating government-verified document systems, reducing paperwork and processing time significantly.
The comprehensive technology stack includes web applications built with MERN stack and native mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms, ensuring accessibility across all devices.
features: Integration with IndiaStack Digilocker API for document verification
Real-time application processing and status tracking
Secure document storage and verification system
publications.impact: Streamlined admission processes for educational institutions, reducing processing time by 60%
